Burgers.name: Classic American Burger
Burgers.desc: The classic beef patty served with lettuce, onions, tomato, and pickles in between artisan buns.

Burgers.name: Classic American Cheeseburger
Burgers.desc: Like our Classic American Burger friend, but now served with melted, cheddar cheese.

Burgers.name: The Western Burger with No Name
Burgers.desc: A beef patty topped with onion rings, white cheese, grilled onions, and barbeque sauce.

Burgers.name: Veggie Burger
Burgers.desc: Bean patty with lettuce, onions, tomato, and pickles.

Burgers.name: Chicken Burger
Burgers.desc: Your choice of grilled or crispy chicken served with white cheese, lettuce, and mustard.

Burgers.name: Patty Melt
Burgers.desc: A patty with melted swiss cheese and grilled onions served in sourdough or wheat bread.

Sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
Sandwiches.desc: Steak sandwich served with white cheese, mushrooms, onions, and sauteed peppers in a hoagie bread.

Sandwiches.name: Club Sandwich
Sandwiches.desc: Your choice of turkey or ham topped with avocado, pepper, and bacon.

Sandwiches.name: Cold Cut Classic
Sandwiches.desc: Turkey, pastrami, or ham sandwich topped with mayo, lettuce, and your choice of cheddar, provolone, or white cheese. Served on your choice of white, sourdough, or wheat bread.

Sandwiches.name: BLT
Sandwiches.desc: Bacon, lettuce, and tomato served on your choice of white, sourdough, or wheat bread.

Sandwiches.name: Meatball Sub
Sandwiches.desc: Italian meatballs topped with red sauce and mozzarella cheese served in a hoagie bread.

Sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
Sandwiches.desc: Grilled cheese sandwich with your choice of cheddar, provolone, or white served on your choice of white, sourdough, or wheat bread.

Sandwiches.name: Cali Veggie
Sandwiches.desc: A sandwich with tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuce, and your choice of avocado, hummus, or pesto spread.

Pasta.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
Pasta.desc: A plate of fettuccine tossed in Parmesan cheese with mushrooms.

Pasta.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
Pasta.desc: A plate of spaghetti and seasoned, Italian meatballs topped with red sauce.

Pasta.name: Chicken Penne
Pasta.desc: A plate of penne pasta, cooked chicken, baby tomatoes, and peas topped with alfredo sauce.

Pasta.name: Lasagna
Pasta.desc: A slice of lasagne stuffed in ricotta cheese, red sauce, and Italian sausage.

Pasta.name: Stuffed Ravioli
Pasta.desc: A plate of ravioli stuffed with ricotta cheese and your choice of ground beef or spinach and mushrooms.

Salads and Soups.name: Greek Salad
Salads and Soups.desc: Salad topped with tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, feta cheese, and tossed with olive oil.

Salads and Soups.name: Caesar Salad
Salads and Soups.desc: Salad with Parmesan cheese, croutons, avocado, and topped with caesar dressing.

Salads and Soups.name: Mediterranean Chicken
Salads and Soups.desc: Marinated chicken over a salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, and parsley.

Salads and Soups.name: Pick Me Up Chicken Noodle Soup
Salads and Soups.desc: Chicken, noodles, and chopped carrots and celery in chicken broth. Great for days when you're under the weather.

Salads and Soups.name: Italian Meatball Soup
Salads and Soups.desc: Italian meatballs, potatoes, garlic, and chopped squash in boiling hot beef broth.

Salads and Soups.name: French Onion Soup
Salads and Soups.desc: Caramelized onion and melted cheese over beef stock. Served with sourdough bread.

Salads and Soups.name: Chili
Salads and Soups.desc: A hot stew with beef, kidney beans, tomatoes, corn, and oregano seasoning.

Salads and Soups.name: Clam Chowder Soup
Salads and Soups.desc: A hearty soup with clams and potatoes in a creamy broth.

Sides.name: Mozzarella Sticks
Sides.desc: Five (5) mozzarella sticks served with your choice of ranch or marinara sauce.

Sides.name: Onion Rings
Sides.desc: A tray of fried onion rings.

Sides.name: Fries
Sides.desc: A tray of our seasoned fries.

Sides.name: Garlic Fries
Sides.desc: A tray of fries topped in garlic and parmesan cheese.
